participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and compassionate, enjoys helping others and thrives in social situations.
participant_1.background: in my spare time i do volunteer work. i enjoy being around people. i am a professional wrestler. i volunteer in a homeless shelter.

participant_2.name: Jamie
